pkgmetadata.longdescription: Identify and Measure Tree Rings on X-Ray Micro-Density Profiles // Contains functions to identify tree-ring borders based on X-ray micro-density profiles and a Graphical User Interface (GUI) to visualize density profiles and correct tree-ring borders. Campelo F, Mayer K, Grabner M. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.dendro.2018.11.002.
